thread.title: RICHARD

author: RICHARD
title: RICHARD
text:
Good course. I believe some chapters could be cut down or removed. Parts about the automobile care could be for younger driver's. Maybe 2 type's of defensive courses. One for younger less experienced driver's and a second option for mature driver's. I know how to check my tire pressure and fluid levels.
Been operating farm equipment and vehicles since age 12 and now I'm 63.
Common sense goes a long way in driving. Been in one accident in my life and it was the other driver's fault---he got 2 tickets; me = 0
